WorkItem.Description:
## Feature Request
Add an `IsComputingLayout` property to the `GraphLayout` class. The addition should be a dependency property so that it can be bound to in XAML.

## Rationale
This would allow callers to determine if the `GraphLayout` is currently executing a layout algorithm asynchronously. This, in turn, would be useful to indicate to users that the control is working on laying out the graph.

## Note
I intend to fork and implement this feature myself but I created this issue in case someone else can get to it before me.
